definition: lit. not fit for elegant hall (of artwork)/not presentable/coarse/unrefined
pinyin: bu4 deng1 da4 ya3 zhi1 tang2

definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Western painting too real in the eyes of the Chinese people, unrefined.
sentences.chinese: 西畫在中國人眼裏太實，不登大雅之堂。

sentences.english: Consume whole cereals or bread made from whole unrefined cereals.
sentences.chinese: 製成麪包或全穀類全穀類不登大雅之堂。

sentences.english: In this case, it is the unrefined carbohydrates.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，它是不登大雅之堂的碳水化合物。

definition: (of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
folk songs of the state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]/popular art forms (cf. 陽春白雪|阳春白雪[yang2 chun1 bai2 xue3], highbrow art forms)
to pick up what others say (idiom); to pass off other people's opinions as one's own/to parrot
dissenting religious sect (idiom); heretical school of opinion/dissident group
marketplace/town/the street (urban milieu)/the haunts of the common people
to promote sex and violence/to stir up lust and covetousness
